PUT /organization/:org

https://http.cloud.tiny-mesh.com/v2/organization/:org
200 OK – A Network Object
401 Unauthorized – A Error object
403 Forbidden – Authentication failed, or no access to the resource. Error object

Description

Retrieves the Network resource identified by nid.

THIS IS A HEADER
